hook_text:
[VISUAL: Epsilon, a tiny, grumpy dragon, sitting at a chalkboard overflowing with cookies.]
DIALOGUE: Alright, you little degenerates, let us count these delicious cookies!

style_decision.reasoning: A 'Family Guy' style directly translates to a 'cartoon' visual style. This is ideal for Instagram as it allows for expressive character animation, vibrant colors, and visual metaphors.  The vibrant palette will make the content pop on a platform with a general audience, and the humor inherent in the requested style will drive engagement.

positioning_decision.reasoning: For Instagram, the 'bottom_center' position is a good balance. It keeps the overlay out of the top crucial content area and avoids the bottom 20% which is typically where Instagram UI elements might appear, ensuring the overlay remains visible and doesn't obstruct key parts of the cartoon.

ffmpeg_command: ffmpeg -i outputs/calculus_dragon_ep1_20250727_233819/temp_files/base_video.mp4 -vf drawtext=text='Cold Numbers 🥶':fontcolor=#45B7D1:fontsize=50:font='Arial-Bold':box=1:boxcolor=#FFFFFF@0.9:boxborderw=2:x=(w-text_w)/2:y=1152:enable=between(t\,6.1\,8.5),drawtext=text='Infinite Spiral ♾️':fontcolor=#E74C3C:fontsize=53:font='Trebuchet-Bold':box=1:boxcolor=#FFFFFF@0.9:boxborderw=2:x=(w-text_w)/2:y=200:enable=between(t\,11.1\,13.5),drawtext=text='Real Line 📏':fontcolor=#54A0FF:fontsize=50:font='Helvetica-Bold':box=1:boxcolor=#FFFFFF@0.9:boxborderw=2:x=(w-text_w)/2:y=1152:enable=between(t\,13.6\,16.0),drawtext=text='Intervals 🔣':fontcolor=#C44569:fontsize=52:font='Verdana-Bold':box=1:boxcolor=#FFFFFF@0.9:boxborderw=2:x=(w-text_w)/2:y=1152:enable=between(t\,18.6\,21.0),drawtext=text='Follow for':fontcolor=#FF00FF:fontsize=56:font='Anton':box=1:boxcolor=#FFFF00@0.7:boxborderw=3:x=(w-text_w)/2:y=1720:enable=between(t\,16.77\,18.169999999999998),drawtext=text='more':fontcolor=#FF00FF:fontsize=56:font='Anton':box=1:boxcolor=#FFFF00@0.7:boxborderw=3:x=(w-text_w)/2:y=1640:enable=between(t\,18.27\,19.669999999999998) -c:a copy -y outputs/calculus_dragon_ep1_20250727_233819/temp_files/timed_overlays_base_video.mp4
